categoryBlurb: Here are a few perfect gift ideas for outdoors-loving family and friends. Most gear enthusiasts are always seeking the newest, lightest, and fastest thing, but often they canâ€™t afford to get it themselves. With GiftStarter, now you can gift that latest gear with others by group gifting it.

productList.productName: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed Duo 600 2-Season Sleeping Bag
productList.productDescription:
This awesome zipper-less sleeping bed bag is a perfect group gift idea for the loving couple that loves to camp in the spring and summer.


From the Manufacturer:


You asked for it - and we built it. Now you can "sleep" in the wild like you do at home, with a comforter…and a special someone. With an oversized, integrated comforter sealing the opening, you can "sleep" comfortably and naturally on your back, side, or stomach. Plus, it's lighter than carrying two separate bags.


 


Season: 2 Season


Weight: 3 lbs 15 oz. / 1.78 kg
productList.productMetaDescription: The Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed Duo 600 2-Season Sleeping Bag is a perfect group gift for couples that love spring and summer camping.

productList.productDescription:
The Original Oru Kayak- The Bay, is a great and unique group gift idea that is perfect for both novice and expert kayakers.  


From manufacturer:
The original Oru Kayak, launched on Kickstarter and now in retailers around the world; it’s even the permanent collection of the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art. On the water the Bay glides like a dream. It's stable enough for beginners, while the length and contouring make it fast and sporty for expert kayakers. There's plenty of room to stash gear (or a picnic) for day trips and short camping excursions. Best of all, transforming it from box to boat takes just a few minutes.


The Oru Kayak magically folds out of a compact box. You can pack it in a trunk, check it on a plane, or hike it in to remote waters. The Oru Kayak skin, a double-layered polypropylene formulated to our specifications, is manufacturer-rated for 20,000 fold cycles. It doesn't take a calculator to know that's a lot of days out on the water. The material is tough, resilient, and abrasion-resistant. The two layers offer extra protection and make Oru Kayaks naturally buoyant. All plastics used in fittings and connections are durable, marine-grade, and UV rated for long life. All metal fasteners are marine-rated stainless steel. Oru Kayaks are extremely rigid and sturdy. The patented fold pattern allows the skin to act as a monolithic structural unit, without the need for an internal frame. The skin is folded from a single, seamless sheet. The only seam is on top of the boat, above the waterline- and it closes tight with a waterproof seal. A rigid floorboard reinforces the cockpit (and doubles as the lid of the box). A pair of bulkheads provide extra rigidity. Simple straps and buckles hold everything together. Oru Kayaks are fully recyclable, and our manufacturing process uses 70% less petroleum than a standard kayak. Another way to save fossil fuels? We highly recommend kayak commuting. Oru Kayaks are designed and made right here in California. We're proud to be part of a new wave of American manufacturing-focused on quality, flexibility and continuous innovation. We believe in American workers, American suppliers, and American quality.


FEATURES


-Comfortable foam seat and fully-adjustable backrest


-Easy-to-close watertight seams


-2 rubber deck straps for extra gear


-Easy-to-adjust footrest


-Reinforced cockpit for easy entry


-Pair of bulkheads for extra rigidity


-Simple and intuitive strap and buckle closure system


-Fits standard spray skirts (size medium)


SPECIFICATIONS



  • LENGTH: 12' [3.7 M]

  • WIDTH: 25" [63 CM]

  • WEIGHT: 26 LBS [12 KG]

  • WEIGHT CAPACITY: 260-300LBS

  • COCKPIT: 16"X30" [41X76 CM]

  • BOX LENGTH: 32" [81 CM]

  • BOX WIDTH: 13" [33 CM]

  • BOX HEIGHT: 28" [71 CM]

  • US PATENT NO. 8316788
productList.productMetaDescription: The Original Oru Kayak- The Bay, is a great and unique group gift idea that is perfect for both novice and expert kayakers.

productList.productDescription:
The Kodak PixPro SP360 is an action camera that captures 360 degree HD video, and is a perfect group gift idea for any outdoor adventurist.


 


Capture perspectives as unique as your adventures with the Kodak PIXPRO SP360 Action Camera. Using a unique dome-shaped fixed lens, the camera records a 360° fisheye view of the surroundings, with multiple modes provided on how that image is 'unfolded' and viewed. Among the viewing options is the full circular fisheye view, a 360° panorama mode, and a dual front 180° and rear 180° mode that's great for capturing your POV as well as your reactions with a single camera. To take advantage of its versatile recording options in a variety of environments, the camera features a compact and rugged design that is 14°F freezeproof, shockproof from falls up to 6.5', dustproof, and splash resistant.

The SP360's 16-Megapixel MOS sensor lets you capture video in a variety of resolutions and frame rates including 16:9 formats up to 1920x1080 at 30 fps and 1280x720 at 60 fps, 1:1 square formats up to 1440x1440 at 30 fps, and 4:3 formats up to 1280x960 at 50fps. For slow motion playback, you can record 120 fps at a WVGA (848x480) resolution. The camera also takes still photos at resolutions up to 10-megapixels, with burst mode shooting up to 10 fps so you won't miss that perfect moment. The SP360 is also equipped with a motion sensor setting to automatically trigger video recording when it detects movement.

Video and photos are recorded to microSD/SDHC cards up to 32GB in size. The camera also features a built-in 1.0" LCD screen, micro-USB 2.0 port, and micro HDMI port. When you're ready to share your videos or photos, built-in Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity makes it easy to transfer files to your mobile device, and connect to the free PIXPRO Remote Viewer app foriOS and Android devices. Among it's features, the app lets you toggle between viewing options, start/stop recording, take photos. Included with the camera is a rechargeable lithium-ion battery, Battery charger, USB cable, AC adapter, glass lens cover, protective cover, cleaning cloth, and a carrying case.




Main Features



  • 16MP 1/2.33" MOS sensor

  • 360° curved lens with multiple viewing/"unfold" modes

  • Video up to 1080p30

  • Slow-motion 120 fps at 848x480 resolution

  • Still photos up to 10-Megapixels

  • 10 fps burst mode

  • 1.0" LCD

  • Electronic image stabilization

  • Time Lapse: 1, 2, 5, 10, 30, and 60 sec intervals

  • Motion Detection start/stop recording for Movie mode the view, it will automatically start recording

  • Built-in Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity

  • Control Wirelessly with iOS and Android devices using free app





Unfold Viewing Modes



  • Dome - Unfolds into a dome-like view

  • Front - A center extract of the full fish-eye image circle (1:1 aspect ratio) with 212° angle of view

  • Segment - Dual 180° views of front and rear, or either side of you

  • Ring - 360° Wrap-around view

  • Panorama - Similar to ring, but unfolds the image into a 360° panorama





Rugged



  • Shockproof up to 6.5'

  • 14°F Freezeproof

  • Dustproof rating: JIS/IEC IP6X

  • Splash resistant


Manufacturer’s details
productList.productMetaDescription: The new Kodak PixPro SP360 is a new generation of action cameras that capture 360 degree HD video, and is a perfect group gift idea for any outdoor adventurist.

productList.productName: ION Audio Rock Speaker Bluetooth - Outdoor Bluetooth Garden and Patio Speaker (Pair)
productList.productDescription:
The ION Audio Rock Speakers are a great group gift idea for anyone who could use bluetooth speakers outside their home or when camping.


 


PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Inconspicuous Outdoor Speaker

  • Stream From Any Bluetooth MP3 Player

  • Durable Weather-Resistant Housing

  • Built-in 48-Hour Rechargeable Battery

  • Lightweight, Portable Design

  • Use With Another Rock Speaker Bluetooth


 


 


This ION Audio Rock Speaker Bluetooth (Pair) is an outdoor garden and patio speaker that is designed to blend in with your yard's landscape and can stream music from any Bluetooth music player, including iPad, iPhone, iPod, and Android devices. It is housed in a durable, weather-resistant housing that protects against splashing water from any angle. 

The speaker also features a long-lasting rechargeable battery that operates up to 48 hours per charge, ideal for all-day parties and backyard entertaining. You can also link two Rock Speaker Bluetooth speakers together wirelessly for more coverage area.



  • Streams music wirelessly from any Bluetooth music player or phone

  • Level IPX4 water-resistant: protected against splashing water

  • Built-in rechargeable battery lasts up to 48 hours per charge

  • Wirelessly connects to an additional Rock Speaker Bluetooth (sold separately)

  • Lightweight, portable design, easy to move around the yard

  • Realistic rock design, perfect for gardens or patios
productList.productMetaDescription: The ION Audio Rock Speakers are a great group gift idea for anyone who could use bluetooth speakers outside their home or when camping.

Unisex: Men’s or Women’s


Sizes: S, M, L


Colors:  Matte Acid Ombre, Matte Black Ombre, Matte Fire Insomniac, Matte Black, Matte White, Matte Cement, Matte Mustard, Matte White, Matte Neon Orange, Matte Trail Camo, and White.


MIPS Option: Additional $40 on select colors.  Late availability- please contact giftconcierge@giftstarter.co for more information


From Manufacturer:


The award winning Forefront. A full-coverage helmet ideal for all-mountain riding or racing, the Forefront’s AEROCORE™ construction featuring Koroyd® creates a low volume helmet with ventilated protection that fully integrates with your sunglasses, goggles, light, or POV camera. Available with MIPS in select colors.


PRODUCT FEATURES



  • Lightweight AEROCORE In-Mold Construction

  • Ventilated Protection Featuring Patented Koroyd Material

  • Integrated Skeletal Structure

  • VaporFit Adjustable Fit System

  • Adjustable/Removeable Visor

  • Integrated Camera & Light Mount

  • Ultra-Light Single Layer Webbing

  • AirEvac Ventilation

  • Goggle Retention Strap Included

  • *MIPS system available in select colors

  • LIFETIME WARRANTY

productList.productDescription:
For the campers in your circles, the award-winning BioLite CampStove features a contained fire used for cooking while also converting unused energy into electricity with proprietary thermoelectric technology. This unused energy is stored and able to charge a tablet or mobile phone via an attached USB port. The CampStove can even work in a home emergency situation by enabling hot meals and device charging in the event of a power outage.  This is a perfect group gift for anyone who enjoys camping or hiking the outdoors.  You can charge your devices by burning twigs and pinecones!


From the manufacturer:


Tech Specs


Charging Time:  iPhone 4S (2G): 20 minutes of charging provides 60 minues of talk time. Charging times vary by device and by strength of fire


Weight: 2.06 lbs (33 oz)


Fuel: Renewable BioMass (twigs, pinecone, wood pellets, etc.)


Fire Quality: 1.6 oz (46 grams) of wood to boil 1 liter of water


Fire Power Output:  Peak: 3.4 kW (LO), 5.5 kW (HI)


Boil Time:  4.5 minutes to boil 1 liter of water. Boiling times vary by strength of fire


Packed Size:  Height 8.25 inches (209.6 mm)  Width 5 inches (127 mm)


Compatible Device:  Powers most USB-chargeable devices including smart phones


USB Power Output:  Max Continuous: 2W @5V  Peak: 4W @5V


Charging Time:  iPhone 4S (2G): 20 minutes of charging provides 60 minues of talk time. Charging times vary by device and by strength of fire


In The Box:  Stuff Sack, Instructions, USB Cord (for internal battery charging), BioLite Stove, Firelighter
productList.productMetaDescription: The BioLite Wood Burning CampStove is a perfect group gift for anyone who enjoys camping the outdoors.  Charge your devices using twigs.

Charging Time:  iPhone 4S (2G): 20 minutes of charging provides 60 minues of talk time. Charging times vary by device and by strength of fire

productList.productDescription:
Keeping as warm as possible with the least weight is one of the core goals of any outdoor enthusiast.  The Brooks Range Mojave Down Jacket provides ultimate warmth while ice climbing or trekking the frigid backcounty.  The recipient will definitely remember the friends and family that came together to group gift this awesome warm jacket awhile adventuring the cold outdoors.


From the Manufacturer:


It’s not always warm and sunny on our adventures. This is why we created our warmest down jacket the Mojave. The Mojave uses 800+ fill down that has been treated with DownTek™ technology. This nano technology creates a down fill that is water repellant with additional anti-microbial and anti-bacterial protection for long term durability DownTek™ help increase your protection from bad weather as well as our own body moisture while being active in the backcountry. Trekking

Features 



  • DownTek™

  • 800+ Fill power

  • Fill Weight: 6oz medium

  • Total weight: 16oz medium

  • Pertex Quantum fabric

  • Attached hood

  • Baffled chest construction

  • Zipper chin guard

  • Low bulk cuffs

  • Rise Free arm construction
productList.productMetaDescription: The Brooks Range Mojave Down Jacket provides the ultimate warmth, and will be a memorable group gift from friends and family.

productList.productName: Mio Global FUSE Heart Rate Monitor and Activity Tracker Wristband (Large, Crimson)
productList.productDescription:
The Mio Global FUSE Heart Rate Monitor and Activity Tracker Wristband syncs with phones and other fitness devices through Bluetooth or Ant+, and is a great group gift for fitness enthusiasts.


 


PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • Optical Heart Rate Sensing

  • Tracks steps, pace, distance, calories

  • Fits Wrists 6.1 to 8.2" Around

  • Water Resistant to 98'

  • Curved Touchscreen LED Display

  • Bluetooth 4.0

  • ANT+ Integration


 


Track your workouts and daily activity with the large-sized crimson FUSE Heart Rate Monitor and Activity Tracker Wristband from Mio Global. This wristband features an EKG-accurate electro-optical cell sensor that tracks your heart rate by sensing the volume of blood under the skin, dispensing with the need for a chest strap. Computer algorithms analyze the sensor's data so that the heart's true rhythm can be detected, even during high intensity workouts. A stopwatch and timer also allow you to manually time your workouts. The FUSE also sets goals and tracks your day's steps, pace, distance, and calories burned, providing a complete assessment of your daily activity. 

Made from soft silicone, the FUSE fits wrists 6.1 to 8.2" around and is water resistant to 3 atmospheres (98.4'). The curved six-color touchscreen LED display shows your activity and heart rate data at a glance. It can communicate with your smartphone using Bluetooth 4.0, and it is compatible with popular smartphone fitness apps, such as Garmin Fit, Samsung S Health, Endomondo Sports Tracker, and more. The FUSE also uses ANT+ to interface with compatible GPS watches and bike computers, enabling it to fully log your workout. The tracker also displays the time and features a chronograph function for timed exercises. Its battery lasts up to a week and the FUSE comes with a USB charger.


 


Mio FUSE Compatibility
productList.productMetaDescription: The Mio Global FUSE Heart Rate Monitor and Activity Tracker Wristband syncs with phones, and is a great group gift for fitness enthusiasts.

If your adventurist is seeking the lightest gear, then the Arc’Teryx Cerium SL Jacket with body-mapped 850-fill goose down in the torso and sleeves is the sure bet. 


From Manufacturer:


Offering great warmth-to-weight in a super compressible package, this is the lightest weight down jacket in the collection filled with 850 grey goose down. This backcountry specialist jacket is intended primarily as a mid layer in cool, dry conditions. Down Series: Down insulated garments | SL: Super Light.


DESCRIPTION


As the lightest down piece in the collection it functions primarily as a warm mid-layer. Down Composite Mapping™ strategically places Coreloft™ synthetic insulation in areas where moisture may buildup, down in the core and the hood provides maximum warmth. The NEW super lightweight Thisela™ face fabric with DWR provides light moisture protection.


Sizes: 


S, M, L, XL, XXL


Weight: 


185 g / 6.5 oz

Get a new triathlete a helmet that not only keeps them safe, but will help them be more aerodynamic.  The Giro Air Attack is a supreme aero helmet that provides full ventilation found on more traditional road helmets, and is a great group gift idea for the avid bicyclist.


Color Options: Blue/Black, Highlight Yellow/Black, Matte Black/Camo, Matte Black/Glowing Red/Blue, Matte Black/White, Matte White/Silver, Red/Black


From the Manufacturer:


AIR ATTACK™ SHIELD


OUR FIRST AIR ATTACK™ WAS A REVELATION IN STYLING AND PERFORMANCE FOR ALL TYPES OF RIDING.


DETAILS


BUILT FOR SPEED


Our first Air Attack™ was a revelation in styling and performance for all types of riding. Inspired by the original, the new generation Air Attack™ Shield delivers a lightweight, compact and extremely efficient aerodynamic design that slices through air. Features a magnetically fastened eye shield for wraparound eye protection that’s easy to remove during pre-race or warm-up. With an enhanced airflow design and the Roc Loc® Air system, this helmet has redefined the benchmark for performance.


SPECIFICATIONS


FEATURES


Optical shield w/ magnetic attachment (Gray/Silver Flash included. Clear/Silver Flash available), Wind tunnel aided design, Removable X-Static comfort padding, Featherweight webbing with Slimline buckle


CONSTRUCTION


In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner


FIT SYSTEM


Roc Loc Air


VENTILATION


6 vents, internal channeling


AIR ATTACK SHIELD


Inspired by the original, the new Air Attack™ Shield delivers a dose of free speed. Its compact, lightweight and super-aerodynamic design slices through air to deliver a hyper-efficient ride.

productList.productName: Vulture Equipment Works- Cholera Fixed Blade
productList.productDescription:
Whether you're backpacking or lost deep in the woods, adventurists need a solid, reliable knife. This lightweight but still strong enough for any task knife features a fixed 5.5-inch blade coated with Cerakote, a special chemical treatment used to prevent corrosion. It includes a magnesium fire starter and each knife is hand made in the United States using the highest-grade military materials available.


From the manufacturer:


Watch the Cholera video here!


All the products in Vulture's Knife & Tool division are given a name associated with the entomology of the species, in this case Cholera. This blade was named from the disease that can be found all over a vulture's feet or beak.  They can even consume meat tainted with this disease without getting sick, in fact they help prevent the spread of Cholera in the animal kingdom and ultimately on to humans.  The design is ultra simple yet refined for the detail seeking outdoor adventurer,  hunter or operator.  This blades design, while suitable for many survival tasks, is actually intended as a "All Mountain" knife and is right at home on the ranch or a big game hunt.  It features a modified Gyuto design, a Japanese word that means "meat sword", with a few of William's own personal tweaks.  With the addition of a false edge (brought to 90% of an edge) the tip boasts a Trocar style tip allowing it to pierce cleanly and effectively, scrape down bark or just throw a massive spark from your fire steel.


 


This blade features something that William has spent a great deal of time fine tuning, the 4-in-1 handle design.  The user can capture a true "fist grip" with even closing the pinky finger completely which allows for the maximum transfer of power from the forearm to the wrist.  You can hold the blade comfortably in an "ice pick" fashion or even turn the blade inward for a real "butcher's" grip allowing you to dispatch large carcass like a pro.  Please make sure to check out the video explaining the design in our video section.


 


The steel for many of our knives is 1095 that is heat treated between 58-60 rockwell.  The Cholera also features a full tang design which is 3/16'' in thickness making this a truely capable tool.  The grind profile is a modified scandi and has been acid washed with a clear Cerakote finish applied to fight corrosion.  The oval recess in the butt part of the blade is a tuneable fire steel striking edge which from the factory creating 2 points of contact for the industry standard of 3/16" ferrocerium rods, the user can even sharpen this recess to make it into a type of line cutter.  The formed kydex sheath has a rotating MOLLE compatible belt clip allowing the user to rig the knife in either right side up, upside down, horizontal or any angle in between.


 


specifications:


 


Heat Treated 1095 High Carbon Alloy Steel w/ Differential Heat Treatment On Cutting Edge


Modified Scandi Grind (21 Degree)


Individualized Serial Number


Laser Etched Logo


Acid Wash Finish w/ Clear Cerakote Finish


Dark Linen Micarta Handles


Double Red Handle Liners


Kydex Sheath w/ Rotating MOLLE Compliant Belt Clip


Overall 10”


Blade Length 4.89”


Blade Thickness 3/16"


Ferrocerium & Magnesium Starter w/ Holder


Proudly Made In The USA!


Package Includes: Cholera Knife, Kydex Formed Sheath, Magnesium Starter & Sparker w/ Piggy Back Sheath, 1 Length of Genuine 550 Cord, Numbered Certificate, Care Sheet and Vulture Head Sticker.
productList.productMetaDescription: The Vulture Equipment Works Cholera Fixed Blade is a great group gift for the outdoor adventurist.

productList.productDescription:
The Salomon Fellcross is a great group gift idea for the trail runner because shoes are a critical component.  The Salomon Fellcross 3 winter high-performance running shoes are designed for trail running through any mountain terrain. Super comfy with a OrthoLite sock liner, but also strong to take on any terrain.  They also feature Mud & Snow Non-Marking Contagrip, which leaves little or no mark on terrain.


Product Info:


With low wet weight and incredible foothold, the S-LAB FELLCROSS 3 delivers the performance our top athletes demand for racing in mucky conditions. Sold in Men's sizes only (4-13).

productList.productDescription:
Offering women-specific comfort for carrying large loads through the wilderness, this pack's beefed up frame and deluxe suspension provide a supportive and highly customizable fit.


From the manufacturer:


Backpacking/Mountaineering


The women’s specific Xena 85 provides deluxe features, optimal organization and gear access for extended or weeklong backpacking trips lasting 5-10 days, while providing comfort and superb carrying ability.


*Please note the Xena 85 size XS comes standard with a small harness and hipbelt. 


Colors available: Winter Sky Blue, Ruby Red             


Xena 85 Features


  • Dual Compartment Top Pocket

  • Dual Ice Axe Loops

  • Harness Adjustment

  • Hydration

  • Red Compression Strap

  • Side Compression Straps

  • Side Zip Access

  • Sleeping Bag Compartment

  • Sleeping Pad Straps

  • Stow-on-the-Go™

  • Stretch Mesh Front Pocket

  • Stretch Mesh Side Pockets

  • Vertical Zippered Pockets

  • Zippered Hipbelt Pocket


Load Range™


The green to yellow zones represent the recommended load range for this pack.
